text: Do you know how this called ? <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1591808056484500?thread_ts=1591715932.470100&cid=CLJJXGTC0>
I can't find in HubSpot the way to reproduce
I would like to have the tabs separated in left column and right column shows text bloc on toggle tab. I have checked docs but I can't find similar way to do it.

Ahh thanks for the Tag - I dont always check these threads. Sorry for the late reply to this one. Youre looking at building this from scratch? Are you comfortable with HTML CSS and a bit of JS?

Youre essentially looking at building a collapsible/accordion. This isnt exactly the same thing but the overall concept is there. You just have to style it a bit differently <https://www.w3schools.com/howto/howto_js_collapsible.asp>
<@U0158RYK4A0> you can DM me if you have more questions.
<@UQWGKUEN7> thank you, I will try this and yes I have to do it from scratch as I can't find in HubSpot docs and default modules

yea that def isnt a default module. But it shouldnt be too hard to build out. If youre running into problems you can always inspect that module and see all the html/css they used to build it directly on the page.
